articles.content: Stuart Broad has said it would have been pathetic to fall out with Joe Root over his omission from the Caribbean tour and wants England to ride the wave of their long overdue win at Lords when the se… [+5831 chars]

articles.author: Sami Mokbel
articles.title: Gareth Southgate admits risk of racial abuse will sway who takes England's penalties in the future - Daily Mail
articles.description: The UK Football Policing Unit received 600 reports of racist comments sent to England's black players after the Euro 2020 final defeat, and ruled 207 to be criminal.
articles.content:
Gareth Southgate admits the disgusting social media abuse received by black England players after the Euro 2020 final has complicated his selection for future penalty shootouts.
